post.text: We have a responsibility to fight for the next generation. All of us. #TBT

comment.author: Julian
comment.text: There is a reason Donald Trump has over 8 million likes on FB and you only have 4 million; the majority of America recognizes you are a fraud.

replies.author: Kimber
replies.text: Have you followed it tonight? He's almost lapped her by 100,000 just today.
